conversation.message: Hey, you busy? Or can I steal a little of your time? 😉
Steal all you want. My time's yours anyway.
Careful, I might just take that literally. Could show up at your door right now. 😏
Don’t threaten me with a good time. You know I’d open that door in a heartbeat.
Is that so? Guess I should test that theory sometime soon.
Why test when you could just... show up? 😉
Careful, you're making me want to drop everything right now.
And what if I said I wouldn't mind? 😘
Then I guess I'd have no choice but to see you sooner than planned.
Oh, so you're all talk, huh? I thought you were more of an action-taker. 😏
Don’t tempt me. You know I’m just looking for an excuse.
Well, what if I said you don’t need one? The door's open... and so is my schedule. 🥰
You're playing a dangerous game. I might just have to win.
Who said anything about winning? Maybe I want to be caught. 😈
Is that so? Guess I'll have to see just how fast I can get there. 🚗💨
Better hurry. I might not wait forever. Or maybe I will... just to make you sweat.
Oh, you’re trouble, aren’t you? 😜
The best kind. And you love it.
Maybe I do. Maybe I can’t stop thinking about that smile of yours. 💖
Flatterer. But keep talking. I like where this is going. 💋
Oh, you haven’t heard the half of it yet... What if I told you I’ve been counting the days until I see you again?
Counting the days, huh? That’s sweet. But what else have you been imagining? 😏
Now you’re really trying to get me to confess. What if I said I’ve been imagining pulling you into my arms the second I see you?
Mmm... go on. I like the sound of that. 😘
And maybe trailing my fingers down your back, just to hear that little gasp you make when I surprise you.
You’re playing with fire, Alex. 🔥
Then maybe I should see if I can handle the heat... or if I need you to cool me down.
Careful... I might just take you up on that challenge. 😏
I hope you do. Because the next time I see you, there won’t be any holding back. 💋
